title: PPC graph - which change indicates a recession

content.question: The diagram above shows three production possibilities curves (PPCs). If the current PPC is PPC1, which of the following changes indicates a recession?

choices.label: Movement from point X to point Y
Movement from point Y to point X
Movement from point Y to point Z
Movement from point Z to point X

content.answer: Movement from point Y to point Z
